attributes.title: They killed my pet fish
attributes.review: So recently I downloaded this app and right when I opened it they came knocking on my front door and killed my pet fish 🥺 they didn’t give me any reason as to y but I’m very heart broken the sad part is that my pet fish has been passed down over many generations and now he’s dead Bc of them RIP Nemo u will be missed 🥺🕊

attributes.title: bad app cheeto man idiot
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to take a look at the big old 💀👴🏻orange 🍊cheeto man idefk who tf hired him and this app is the worst thing for humanity, the orange 🍊cheeto man uses this app to get all your money and distract his little army of cheeto ppl. very bad safety controls and keeps saying it wants to build a wall around my phone like how am i gonna get in, with a visa for my phone?!!! hey bro that ain’t cool bruh was the last night y’all were going out to eat with cheeto man. i ran into the tractor that mows my cherry🍒 field and got my hands cut 🩸off. now i’m a double amputee with a fat chin and the back side is very damaged. ugly app.❤️

attributes.title: Soooo slooow
attributes.review: This is slower than my grandma it glitches every 2 seconds and shows very offensive and scary pictures when you open the app. Takes tooooo much storage and isn’t very helpful. I wouldn’t even give it a 1 star. Definitely had to delete because it was so bad. 100% DO NOT RECOMMEND. Get this app off the App Store.- Foreigner💕

attributes.title: This app will ruin your eyeballs
attributes.review: I opened the app and it said to give the Cheeto all my money because I’m a minority and if I didn’t I’d have to suffer the consequences. What kind of app is this?!😡 I’m fuming right now. Not only did it say that, but it said I’d have to pay 100 dollars to WATCH him pole dance, I wanted to barf 🤢🤮!!!  This app is sick and disgusting. Can not BELIEVE there’s an app like this

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: The worst presidential election gave me a cheeto as a mother freaking president I hope he does go rot in hell and if he thinks banning tik tok is going to solve his problem then he is 1000 percent wrong we all saw how much power we have over not only this country but others as well so freak Donald trump and tik tok will always be more powerful than you fax no printer period

attributes.title: SMH
attributes.review: I was honestly hoping to learn more about our president and how he plans to run this country. But I tried using the app that immediately started glitching. It caused my who to stop working. I couldn’t even get it turned on for a hour. I’m so out raged because now my phone won’t act properly with the app on my Device. 😤😒

attributes.title: Embarrassing
attributes.review: This app is one of if not the most unorganized and confusing apps i’ve ever downloaded. When you open the front page of the app multiple NSFW ads pop up. The music made me want to literally projectile vomit across the room, and seeing an orange with on every screen made me never wanna eat my favorite fruit ever again. I AM DISGUSTED.

attributes.title: I’ve filled out tax forms more interesting than this app
attributes.review: Everything about it is horrible. This app is racist, sexist, homophobic, and often sexual assaults people. They think money can fix everything but this app proves different. This app supports a bunch of failed policy and spews hateful rhetoric that has caused a racial divide. This app is killing our country and the people in it

attributes.title: THIS IS HORRIBLE✨🤢🤮
attributes.review: I Downloaded the app and it gave my phone a VIRUS!  The virus made my background a picture of trump and it made whatever I type TRUMP. It was like he was watching me and infusing my brain with signals like from 5g towers🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮. After I deleted the app the virus went away. I still have no idea what happened. And I am still scared for if it will come back.

attributes.title: Stinky 🥴👹
attributes.review: I cannot believe this app is available. It contains VERY inappropriate material that I would never want to see. It’s worse then the movie Love. Every time I click it I see something that has been harassing our country. Not to mention it took almost 10 HOURS to download. Why would the App Store allow this app. 💅itchin n burnin💞
